name: Disclosure; payment of benefits
text: [§431:10H-213]  Disclosure; payment of benefits.  A long-term care insurance policy that provides for the payment of benefits based on standards described as "usual and customary", "reasonable and customary", or similar words or phrases shall include a definition of these terms and an explanation of the terms in its accompanying outline of coverage. [L 1999, c 93, pt of §2]
